name: Marilyn Monrobot
description:
Marilyn Monroe was treated like a machine until her death. 

After her death, due to complicated death taxes, her image/likeness was left in the public domain with the possibility to returning to the silver screen as a digital recreation. 

As Marilyn once said, 

"I knew I belonged to the public and to the world, not because I was talented or even beautiful, but because I had never belonged to anything or anyone else."
